citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 PM on 14-
August-2023. Inspectors spoke the licensee by phone and confirmed that no responsible adult was available to
accompany APHIS officials for an inspection at that time.
Additional Inspectors:
DANA MILLEREnd Section
